name: *LIMITED* SbJL 2013 Holiday Bags
description: These limited edition Grinchy Holiday bags are the perfect size for a sock or shawl project. Have a sweater that you're working on? Get the large and it'll be nice and cozy while you're working on it. Ornamental Grinch is the first photo Christmas Tree Grinch is the second photo Once a print in this listing is sold out, it's gone forever - I won't be reordering any Grinch fabric this year Regular Wedge: 11" wide, 6" tall and 3" wide at the bottom Large Wedge: 15" wide, 10" tall and 4" wide at the bottom. This size will easily fit a sweater-in progress or (very) large shawl The wedge is a new shape at SbJL - I hope you all love it!

options.name: Ornamental Grinch - Regular Wedge - Red Zip
Ornamental Grinch - Regular Wedge - Green Zip
Ornamental Grinch - Large Wedge (Zip Varies - Green or Red)
Christmas Tree Grinch - Regular Wedge - White Zip
Christmas Tree Grinch - Regular Wedge - Red Zip
Christmas Tree Grinch - Regular Wedge - Green Zip
Christmas Tree Grinch - Large Wedge - Zip Varies (White, Red or Green)

name: To Boldly Go - Transportation
description:
This Stitched by JessaLu Project Bag Boxy Knitting Bag (or a purse or a lunch bag or a makeup bag - there are no limits) is a perfect size to hold your sock-in-progress or any other project - it also works well as a wristlet purse!

All bags are lined with quality coordinating fabric and interfaced. Boxed corners and pull tabs are double stitched for durability.

Each bag includes a color-coordinated zipper pull made of coordinating swarovski crystals and a silver bee - a signature addition to all Stitched by JessaLu bags.

Regular Bag dimensions: 7 1/2 inches long, 4 1/2 inches wide and 3 1/2 inches tall - large enough to hold a sock project or a spindle. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist.

Large Bag dimensions: Approximately 12″ long, 4″ high and 6″ wide - large enough to hold a sweater in progress, shawl in progress, Cabbage Patch Kid doll or small chihuahua. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist.

Regular Wedge: 11" wide, 6" tall and 3" wide at the bottom. The perfect size for socks in progress or a similarly sized project.

Large Wedge: 15" wide, 10" tall and 4" wide at the bottom. This size will easily fit a sweater-in progress or (very) large shawl

All items are made on an antique Singer sewing machine in a smoke-less and dog-friendly home (though she isn't allowed in the sewing room). Please convo me if you have any questions!

name: Notions! (Grab Bag)
description: **This listing is for a 'grab bag' of notions pouches - if you purchase from this listing, please note I am unable to fulfill specific print requests other than 'cute', 'floral' or 'geeky'** You can choose to get a 'grab bag' of cute prints, floral prints, geeky prints or a mix! Geeky prints consist of: Whovian, Firefly, Literary & Comic Book prints. I'll try to mix it up for you but sometimes I may only have Whovian available (or Firefly or Literary or Comic Book) All bags are lined with quality coordinating fabric and interfaced. Corners are double stitched for durability. Approximate Bag Dimensions: 3 inches tall and 7 inches long - just the right size for your stitch markers, crochet hooks, pens & pencils. You can tuck this zip pouch into the side of your Stitched box bag and it fits perfectly into a Stitched bucket! All items are made on an antique Singer sewing machine in a non-smoking and cat-less home (but not dog-less, though they aren't allowed in the sewing room). Please convo me if you have any questions!

name: 5th Element - Multipass!
description:
This Stitched by JessaLu Box Bag Project Bag (or a purse or a lunch bag or a makeup bag - there are no limits) is a perfect size to hold your sock-in-progress or any other small project - it also works well as a wristlet purse!

A box bag sewn for you! Price for this bag is a little higher to cover my cost for the special order fabric.

Outside fabric is a print from Spoonflower. Inside fabric is stars on a dark blue background. Bag may appear larger on the inside. ;o) 

All bags are lined with quality coordinating fabric and interfaced. Boxed corners and pull tabs are double stitched for durability.

Each bag includes a color-coordinated zipper pull made of coordinating swarovski crystals and a silver bee - a signature addition to all Stitched by JessaLu bags.

Regular Bag dimensions: 7 1/2 inches long, 4 1/2 inches wide and 3 1/2 inches tall - large enough to hold a sock project or a spindle. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist.

All items are made on an antique Singer sewing machine in a smoke-less and dog-friendly home (though she isn't allowed in the sewing room). Please convo me if you have any questions!

name: Firefly - Kaywinnit Lee “Kaylee” Frye
description:
Mal: I don't believe there's a power in the 'Verse can stop Kaylee from being cheerful. Sometimes you just want to duct tape her mouth and dump her in the hold for a month.

Kaylee: I love my captain.

This Firefly Themed Stitched by JessaLu Box Bag Project Bag (or a purse or a lunch bag or a makeup bag - there are no limits) is a perfect size to hold your sock-in-progress or any other small project - it also works well as a wristlet purse!

name: **New and Exclusive!** Regular Box Bag - Baker Street
description:
This Sherlock Holmes themed Stitched by JessaLu Box Bag Project Bag (or a purse or a lunch bag or a makeup bag - there are no limits) is a perfect size to hold your sock-in-progress or any other small project - it also works well as a wristlet purse!

A box bag sewn for you! Price for this bag is a little higher to cover my cost for the special order fabric.

Outside fabric is a print from Spoonflower. The background is text from A Scandal in Bohemia with images from The Strand magazine in the foreground. Images can show up in different areas of the bag, this layout is exclusive to SbJL so there will be at least one Sherlock on each bag.

All bags are lined with quality coordinating fabric and interfaced. Boxed corners and pull tabs are double stitched for durability.

Each bag includes a color-coordinated zipper pull made of coordinating swarovski crystals and a silver bee - a signature addition to all Stitched by JessaLu bags.

Bag dimensions: 7 1/2 inches long, 4 1/2 inches wide and 3 1/2 inches tall - large enough to hold a sock project or a spindle. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist.

All items are made on an antique Singer sewing machine in a smoke-less and dog-friendly home (though she isn't allowed in the sewing room). Please convo me if you have any questions!

name: **NEW AND EXCLUSIVE** Box Bag - Jane Austen Pride and Prejudice
description: **NEW AND EXCLUSIVE** This Jane Austen Pride and Prejudice themed Stitched by JessaLu Box Bag Project Bag (or a purse or a lunch bag or a makeup bag - there are no limits) is a perfect size to hold your sock-in-progress or any other small project - it also works well as a wristlet purse! **please see note on Large bag description below** A box bag sewn for you! Price for this bag is a little higher to cover my cost for the special order fabric. Outside fabric is a print from Spoonflower. This print has been reworked exclusively for SbJL - and there is an additional lady on the SbJL version that you won't find elsewhere. The background is text from Pride & Prejudice by Jane Austen with Regency ladies in the foreground. Ladies can show up in different areas of the bag - last photo is an example of another way they can appear. All bags are lined with quality coordinating fabric and interfaced. Second to last photo is lining fabric. Boxed corners and pull tabs are double stitched for durability. Each bag includes a color-coordinated zipper pull made of coordinating swarovski crystals and a silver bee - a signature addition to all Stitched by JessaLu bags. Regular Bag dimensions: 7 1/2 inches long, 4 1/2 inches wide and 3 1/2 inches tall - large enough to hold a sock project or a spindle. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist. Large Bag dimensions: Approximately 12″ long, 4″ high and 6″ wide - large enough to hold a sweater in progress, shawl in progress, Cabbage Patch Kid doll or small chihuahua. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist. (Please note: currently the large version of this bag does not have the chaise lounge lady on it) All items are made on an antique Singer sewing machine in a smoke-less and dog-friendly home (though she isn't allowed in the sewing room). Please convo me if you have any questions!

name: Fight Like a Girl - Breast Cancer Research Bag
description: **Please make sure you choose a bucket, box or wedge bag before adding to your cart!** This is a special print in my shop. It feels like cancer has touched all of us in one way or another and I'd like to do a little bit to help fight back. 50% of the purchase price of this bag will be donated to the American Cancer Society and will be earmarked for breast cancer research. Thank you - I believe every little bit helps when there is a cause to fight for. This is my little bit, thanks for helping. :o)

Approximate Bag Dimensions: 7 inches tall, 4 1/2 inches wide and 3 1/2 inches deep - large enough to hold 2oz of predrafted fiber for spinning or a 4oz ball of singles for plying. You can also use this bucket bag for a knitting or spindling project. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist and have a snap closure so you can hang it from a bag handle or a belt loop for easy no-hands carrying. You can also attach it to your spinning wheel for travel.

All items are made on an antique Singer sewing machine in a smoke-less and dog-friendly home (though she isn't allowed in the sewing room). Please convo me if you have any questions!

name: ALL The Movies
description: A box bag sewn for you! This print has almost every movie character you can think of: Avengers, Harry Potter, Ghostbusters, Star Wars, Wizard of Oz, Pulp Fiction, Indiana Jones, The Hulk, Kill Bill, Iron Man, Men in Black, The Matrix, 3 Stooges, Shaun of the Dead, Superman, HAL2000, too many to list! There are so many on this bag that each bag is going to be a little different! The last photo shows other ways the characters can fall on each bag - unfortunately I cannot guarantee the placement of each movie character. Here are the characters by row (78 in all!): Row 1: Han, Chewbacca, Leia, Luke, C-3PO, R2-D2 Row 2: Yoda, Vader, Stormtrooper, Obi-Wan, Boba Fett, Imperial Guard Row 3: Dorothy, Scarecrow, Tin Man, Cowardly Lion, Wicked Witch, Glinda Row 4: Frankstein's Monster, Bride of Frankenstein, Hannibal Lecter, Neo, Morpheus, Trinity Row 5: Leeloo, Korbin Dallas, Zorg, Diva Plavalaguna, J, K Row 6: Tron, Flynn, Batman, The Joker, Dracula, superman Row 7: Harry, Ron, Hermione, Iron Man, V, Evey Row 8: Little Tramp, Kirk, Spock, Bones, Uhura, A red shirt Row 9: RoboCop, Robin Hood, Sean, Ed, HAL9000, Dave Row 10: The Bride, Lawrence of Arabia, Gort, Alex, Ash, Holly Golightly Row 11: Groucho, Harpo, Chico, Spiderman, Jules, Vincent Row 12: Maria, Zira, Dr. Zaius, Robby the Robot, Hulk, Indiana Jones Row 13: Willie Wonka, Oompa-Loompa, Venkman, Ray, Egon, Winston Zedmore This Stitched by JessaLu Box Bag Project Bag (or a purse or a lunch bag or a makeup bag - there are no limits) is a perfect size to hold your sock-in-progress or any other small project - it also works well as a wristlet purse! All bags are lined with quality coordinating fabric and interfaced. Boxed corners and pull tabs are double stitched for durability. Each bag includes a color-coordinated zipper pull made of coordinating swarovski crystals and a silver bee - a signature addition to all Stitched by JessaLu bags. --This listing is for two sizes! Be sure to choose the correct size before adding it to your cart!-- Regular Bag dimensions: 7 1/2 inches long, 4 1/2 inches wide and 3 1/2 inches tall - large enough to hold a sock project or a spindle. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist. Large bag dimensions: Approximately 12″ long, 4″ high and 6″ wide - large enough to hold a sweater in progress, shawl in progress, Cabbage Patch Kid doll or small chihuahua. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist. All items are made on an antique Singer sewing machine in a smoke-less and dog-friendly home (though she isn't allowed in the sewing room). Please convo me if you have any questions!

name: Firefly - The Hat That Shall Not Be Named
description:
Jayne: (wearing ugly homemade hat) "How's it sit? Pretty cunning, don'tchya think?"

Kaylee: "I think it's the sweetest hat ever."

Book: "Makes a statement."

Jayne: "Yeah, yeah!"

Wash: "A man walks down the street in that hat, people know he's not afraid of anything."

Jayne: "Damn straight."

A box bag sewn for you! Price for this bag is a little higher to cover my cost for the special order fabric.

Outside fabric is a print from Spoonflower. 

Who's Who on this print:

Row 1: Kirk, Spock, Bones, Uhura, Red Shirt
Row 2: Picard, Riker, Troi, Data, Laforge
Row 3: Locutus, Worf, Sisko, Quark, Janeway
Row 4: Seven of Nine, Tuvok, Archer, T'Pol, Phlox

All bags are lined with quality coordinating fabric and interfaced. Boxed corners and pull tabs are double stitched for durability. Lining fabric for this bag is space themed - planets on a starry background.

Each bag includes a color-coordinated zipper pull made of coordinating swarovski crystals and a silver bee - a signature addition to all Stitched by JessaLu bags.

Regular Bag dimensions: 7 1/2 inches long, 4 1/2 inches wide and 3 1/2 inches tall - large enough to hold a sock project or a spindle. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist.

Large Bag dimensions: Approximately 12″ long, 4″ high and 6″ wide - large enough to hold a sweater in progress, shawl in progress, Cabbage Patch Kid doll or small chihuahua. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist.

Bucket Bag Dimensions: 7 inches tall, 4 1/2 inches wide and 3 1/2 inches deep - large enough to hold 2oz of predrafted fiber for spinning or a 4oz ball of singles for plying. You can also use this bucket bag for a knitting or spindling project. Handles are long enough to fit over your wrist and have a snap closure so you can hang it from a bag handle or a belt loop for easy no-hands carrying. You can also attach it to your spinning wheel for travel.

All items are made on an antique Singer sewing machine in a smoke-less and dog-friendly home (though she isn't allowed in the sewing room). Please convo me if you have any questions!
